nodes.text: Galacti-Stok was a subsidiary of TaggeCo. One product it distributed was Happy-Bore Medicated Dewormer, a dewormer designed to control and rid happabores of parasites.

Galacti-Stok is mentioned as part of an Imperial-era Happy-Bore information and instruction pamphlet in Rey's Survival Guide, written by Jason Fry and published in 2015 as part of book releases surrounding Star Wars: The Force Awakens.
